CURRENT ISSUES

Does not detect USB devices. Have to type in "lsusb" 2 or 3 times in terminal before usb devices are recognised. USB devices then detected, but function extremely slow. Have posted problem on a few forums. No Solutions as yet.

* COMMUNICATIONS:" built in 56kbps fax modem; 10/100Mbps LAN Atehros Communications Inc. Ethernet Controller AR2413 802.11bg.
